body:
### Problem

When editing markdown files I'm getting an error from the treesitter parser:
```
Error executing vim.schedule lua callback: /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter/languagetree.lua:406: attempt to yield across C-call boundary
stack traceback:
        [C]: in function 'yield'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter/languagetree.lua:406: in function '_parse_regions'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter/languagetree.lua:618: in function '_parse'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter/languagetree.lua:650: in function '_parse'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter/languagetree.lua:585: in function 'parse'
        ...ender-markdown.nvim/lua/render-markdown/core/context.lua:193: in function 'callback'
        ...ender-markdown.nvim/lua/render-markdown/core/context.lua:215: in function 'for_each'
        ...ender-markdown.nvim/lua/render-markdown/core/context.lua:192: in function 'parse'
        ...ins/render-markdown.nvim/lua/render-markdown/core/ui.lua:202: in function 'parse_buffer'
        ...ins/render-markdown.nvim/lua/render-markdown/core/ui.lua:139: in function 'run_update'
        ...ins/render-markdown.nvim/lua/render-markdown/core/ui.lua:91: in function <...ins/render-markdown.nvim/lua/render-markdown/core/ui.lua:90>
```

### Steps to reproduce

1. Use the following minimal init.lua
```lua
local root = '/tmp/nvim-minimal'

-- Set stdpaths to use root dir
for _, name in ipairs({ 'config', 'data', 'state', 'cache' }) do
    vim.env[('XDG_%s_HOME'):format(name:upper())] = root .. '/' .. name
end

-- Bootstrap lazy
local lazypath = root .. '/plugins/lazy.nvim'
if not vim.loop.fs_stat(lazypath) then
    vim.fn.system({
        'git',
        'clone',
        '--filter=blob:none',
        '--single-branch',
        'https://github.com/folke/lazy.nvim.git',
        lazypath,
    })
end
vim.opt.runtimepath:prepend(lazypath)

-- Install plugins
local plugins = {
    {
        'nvim-treesitter/nvim-treesitter',
        build = ':TSUpdate',
        config = function()
            require('nvim-treesitter.configs').setup({
                ensure_installed = {
                    'markdown',
                    'markdown_inline',
                },
                highlight = {
                    enable = true,
                },
            })
        end,
    },
    {
        'MeanderingProgrammer/render-markdown.nvim',
        dependencies = {
            'nvim-treesitter/nvim-treesitter',
            'nvim-tree/nvim-web-devicons',
        },
        config = function()
            require('render-markdown').setup({
                enabled = true,
                heading = {
                    sign = false,
                    icons = { '󰪥 ', '󰺕 ', ' ', ' ', ' ', '' },
                    position = 'inline',
                },
                link = {
                    custom = {
                        gdrive = {
                            pattern = 'drive%.google%.com/drive',
                            icon = ' ',
                        },
                        spreadsheets = {
                            pattern = 'docs%.google%.com/spreadsheets',
                            icon = '󰧷 ',
                        },
                        document = {
                            pattern = 'docs%.google%.com/document',
                            icon = '󰈙 ',
                        },
                        presentation = {
                            pattern = 'docs%.google%.com/presentation',
                            icon = '󰈩 ',
                        },
                    },
                },
            })
        end,
    },
}

require('lazy').setup(plugins, {
    root = root .. '/plugins',
})
```
2. As in the GIF edit the following `bar.md` file:
```md
# Lorem Ipsum

## Dolor Sit Amet

- Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet

- [Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1A2B3C4D5E6F7G8H9I0J1K2L3M4N5O6P7Q8R9S0T1U2V3W4X5Y6Z7/edit#slide=id.randompath1)
  - Consectetur adipiscing elit
  - Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt
    - Quis nostrud exercitation ullamco

- Laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo
  - [Lorem ipsum dolor sit](https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/1A2B3C4D5E6F7G8H9I0J1K2L3M4N5O6P7Q8R9S0T1U2V3W4X5Y6Z7)
- Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit

- In voluptate velit esse cillum dolore
  - Eu fugiat nulla pariatur

- Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident
  - Sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum
    - [Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1A2B3C4D5E6F7G8H9I0J1K2L3M4N5O6P7Q8R9S0T1U2V3W4X5Y6Z7/edit?gid=randompath2)
  - [Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1A2B3C4D5E6F7G8H9I0J1K2L3M4N5O6P7Q8R9S0T1U2V3W4X5Y6Z7/edit?gid=randompath3)
  - [Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1A2B3C4D5E6F7G8H9I0J1K2L3M4N5O6P7Q8R9S0T1U2V3W4X5Y6Z7/edit?gid=randompath4)
  - [Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1A2B3C4D5E6F7G8H9I0J1K2L3M4N5O6P7Q8R9S0T1U2V3W4X5Y6Z7/edit?gid=randompath5)

- Ut enim ad minim veniam
  - [Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1A2B3C4D5E6F7G8H9I0J1K2L3M4N5O6P7Q8R9S0T1U2V3W4X5Y6Z7/edit?usp=randompath6)

- [Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1A2B3C4D5E6F7G8H9I0J1K2L3M4N5O6P7Q8R9S0T1U2V3W4X5Y6Z7/edit)

- [Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1A2B3C4D5E6F7G8H9I0J1K2L3M4N5O6P7Q8R9S0T1U2V3W4X5Y6Z7/edit?gid=randompath7)

- [Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1A2B3C4D5E6F7G8H9I0J1K2L3M4N5O6P7Q8R9S0T1U2V3W4X5Y6Z7/edit?gid=randompath8)

- [Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1A2B3C4D5E6F7G8H9I0J1K2L3M4N5O6P7Q8R9S0T1U2V3W4X5Y6Z7/edit?usp=randompath9)
  - Consectetur adipiscing elit
```
3. Delete multiple times the line first line that that contains the `Drive` url/link (i.e line 13)
4.  After 3. the error pops out

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d46d77ee-9047-4203-8138-0fd6dc5467dd)

### Expected behavior

I originally thought this was a plugin error and reported it here https://github.com/MeanderingProgrammer/render-markdown.nvim/issues/387#issuecomment-2770893020 but the plugin author mentioned this is probably some edge case with neovim's own parser.

### Nvim version (nvim -v)

NVIM v0.12.0-dev-88+ge8785c2e94

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

No idea

### Operating system/version

Arch Linux

### Terminal name/version

Kitty 0.41.1

### $TERM environment variable

xterm-256color

### Installation

AUR
title: treesitter parser attempt to yield C-call boundary error
